about_the_game:
※This content requires the base game (sold separately) in order to play. Please also ensure that your base game software is updated to the most recent patch.

Description:
A bundle including the DLC Pack Volume 1 Set, the DLC Volume 2 Set, and the DLC Volume 3 Set.

DLC Volume 1 Set:
・New Story Vol. 1: "Super Special Dreamer #1~#3"
・Bonus Challenge Quest: "Super Special Dreamer EX"
・Additional Character Vol. 1: "Citrin"
・Additional Character Vol. 2: "Spinel"

DLC Volume 2 Set:
・New Story Vol. 2: "Danger Mountain March #1~#3"
・Bonus Challenge Quest: "Danger Mountain March EX"
・Additional Character Vol. 2: "Kiesel"
・Additional Character Vol. 2: "Lazuli"

DLC Volume 3 Set:
・New Story Vol. 3: "Linking Light's Successor #1~#3"
・Bonus Challenge Quest: "Linking Light's Successor EX"
・Additional Character Vol. 3: "Euclase"
・Additional Character Vol. 3: "Lapis"
